name: Lights (dreamlikesquirrel)
description:
Light - simple game create for Brackeys Gamejam 2020.2. The theme was "Rewind". Concept was really simple - base on the tape rewinding from the future we want to create simple clicker game where player need to repeat sequence, but from the last to first poping element.

Game contains 10 levels with increasing level difficulty.

Good luck and have fun :)
